text: The American Bulldog is a large breed of dog. It comes from the Old English Bulldog. They are now used on animal farms, in dog sports, and for showing. They are part of American culture and history. They are shown as strong and tough. In November 2019, the American Bulldog was added to the American Kennel Club (AKC) Foundation Stock Service (FSS). Category:Dog breeds originating in the United States
title: American Bulldog
